query.statement:
SELECT '등록' AS GUBUN, '' AS DAEGI, A.LIFNR , A.PERNO, A.TEMNO AS TMCD , A.NAMEE, CASE WHEN A.POSIT = 'X' THEN 'X' ELSE '' END GBN , CASE WHEN A.POSIT = 'X' THEN '팀장' ELSE '사원' END POSIT , CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS TUIP_CHKA, CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKB = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS TUIP_CHKB, CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS STORED_TUIP_CHKA, CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKB = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS STORED_TUIP_CHKB, VALUE(B.M_MH, 0) AS M_MH, VALUE(B.A_MH, 0) AS A_MH, VALUE(B.N_MH, 0) AS N_MH, B.SAYU, B.BIGO , B.INP_DT , '' AS CHECK , '' AS CHKS, '' AS CHK , CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' OR B.TUIP_CHKB = 'X' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TUIP , 'Y' AS ACT , '' AS INTO, B.SAYU AS OLD_SAYU
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0301 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND A.PERNO = B.PERNO AND A.TEMNO = B.TMCD AND B.INP_DT = #INP_DT# AND A.GBN = 'A' WHERE A.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR# AND A.TEMNO = #TMCD# AND (A.POSIE = 'X' OR A.POSIT = 'X') AND A.GUBUN IN ('01','02') AND A.TYPE = '1' AND A.DIRECT = 'X' AND A.ACTSS NOT IN ('15', '16') -- AND A.RETIF <> 'X' AND (A.RETID = '' OR A.RETID = '00000000' OR A.RETID >= #INP_DT#) AND A.ENTER <= #INP_DT# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0301 AS ST2 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0138 AS PS ON ST2.MANDT = PS.MANDT AND ST2.LIFNR = PS.LIFNR AND ST2.PERNO = PS.PERNO AND ST2.INP_DT = #INP_DT# WHERE ST2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ST2.LIFNR = A.LIFNR AND PS.PERKEY = A.PERKEY AND PS.RETIF <> 'X' AND PS.TYPE = '1' AND PS.DIRECT = 'X')
UNION ALL
SELECT '대기' AS GUBUN, '' AS DAEGI,T.LIFNR , T.PERNO, T.TMCD , T.NAMEE, CASE WHEN P1.POSIT = 'X' THEN 'X' ELSE '' END GBN , CASE WHEN P1.POSIT = 'X' THEN '팀장' ELSE '사원' END POSIT , CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS TUIP_CHKA, CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKB = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS TUIP_CHKB, CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS STORED_TUIP_CHKA, CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKB = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS STORED_TUIP_CHKB, VALUE(B.M_MH, 0) AS M_MH, VALUE(B.A_MH, 0) AS A_MH, VALUE(B.N_MH, 0) AS N_MH, B.SAYU, B.BIGO , B.INP_DT , '' AS CHECK , '' AS CHKS, '' AS CHK , CASE WHEN B.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' OR B.TUIP_CHKB = 'X' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS TUIP , 'Y' AS ACT , '' AS INTO, B.SAYU AS OLD_SAYU FROM (SELECT P1.MANDT, P1.LIFNR , P1.PERNO, P1.TEMNO AS TMCD , P1.NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0138 AS P1 WHERE P1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(P.MANDT) = 0 THEN 'B' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P2.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P2.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P2.SIGN > '') = 0 THEN 'A' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P2.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P2.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P2.SIGN = '반송') > 0 OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P2.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P2.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P2.SIGN > '') = COUNT(P.MANDT) THEN 'D' ELSE 'C' END END CNT FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 AS P WHERE P.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P.GBN = P1.GBN ) IN ('A' , 'C') AND (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(P.MANDT) = 0 THEN 'B' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P2.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P2.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P2.SIGN > '') = 0 THEN 'A' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P2.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P2.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P2.SIGN = '반송') > 0 OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P2.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P2.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P2.SIGN > '') = COUNT(P.MANDT) THEN 'D' ELSE 'C' END END CNT FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0143 AS P WHERE P.MANDT = P1.MANDT AND P.LIFNR = P1.LIFNR AND P.PERNO = P1.PERNO AND P.GBN = P1.GBN ) <> 'D' AND P1.STATS = 'B' AND P1.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR# AND P1.TEMNO = #TMCD# AND ( P1.POSIE = 'X' OR P1.POSIT = 'X') AND P1.GUBUN IN ('01','02') AND P1.TYPE = '1' AND P1.DIRECT = 'X' AND P1.ACTSS NOT IN ('00', '15', '16') AND P1.RETIF <> 'X' AND P1.GBN = 'A'
UNION ALL
SELECT B.MANDT, B.LIFNR ,B.PERNO, B.TMCD , B.NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0301 AS B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR# AND B.TMCD = #TMCD# AND B.INP_DT = #INP_DT# AND SUBSTR(B.PERNO,1,1) = 'P' ) AS T
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0138 AS P1 ON P1.MANDT = T.MANDT AND P1.LIFNR = T.LIFNR AND P1.PERNO = T.PERNO AND P1.TEMNO = T.TMCD AND P1.GBN = 'A'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0301 AS B ON T.MANDT = B.MANDT AND T.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND T.PERNO = B.PERNO AND T.TMCD = B.TMCD AND B.INP_DT = #INP_DT#
WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR# AND T.TMCD = #TMCD#
GROUP BY T.MANDT, T.LIFNR , T.PERNO, T.TMCD ,P1.POSIT ,B.TUIP_CHKA,B.TUIP_CHKB,B.INP_DT, B.SAYU, B.BIGO ,B.M_MH,B.A_MH,B.N_MH,T.NAMEE
FOR FETCH ONLY
